Commands.Round Edge: 2-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + ST HP attack  Grants 2 stacks of 「Soul of Chaos」 for 3 turns   While 「Soul of Chaos V」 is active:  Turns to 「Round Edge+」  　∟ 4-HIT AoE melee BRV attack + ST HP attack  　　Grants 2 stacks of 「Soul of Chaos」 for 3 turns   「Soul of Chaos」 raises Max BRV and Attack
Commands.Soul of Chaos: 3-HIT melee BRV + HP attack  Grants 1 stack of 「Soul of Chaos」 for 3 turns   While 「Soul of Chaos V」 is active:  Turns to 「Soul of Chaos+」  　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV + HP attack (higher potency)  　　Grants 1 stack of 「Soul of Chaos」 for 3 turns
Commands.Set Soul of Discord BRV Up: Raises BRV based on Attack  Grants 「Soul of Discord」 for 1 turn  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Disaster of Chaos: 1-HIT melee BRV + HP attack  + 2-HIT melee BRV + HP attack  + 3-HIT melee BRV + HP attack  + 4-HIT melee BRV + HP attack  Grants 「Soul of Discord」 for 1 turn   「Soul of Discord」 has the following effects:  - Raises Attack and Max BRV Overflow limit  - Delays target by 1 turn if the attack lands

Passives.Round Edge Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Round Edge  and  Round Edge+
Passives.Berserker: After using  BRV Attack  or any ability (including enhanced BRV/HP Attack):- Marginally raises Attack up to 10 times.
Passives.Soul of Chaos Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Soul of Chaos  and  Soul of Chaos+
Passives.Ability Speed High: Slightly lowers Action Delay when using abilities continuously
Passives.Warrior Craving Discord: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack while  Soul of Chaos  is active
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Round Edge Extend: When using  Round Edge :- Greatly raises BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRVWhen using  Round Edge+ :- Greatly raises BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Grants  Soul of Discord  for 1 turn if target is broken by the abilityWhile  Soul of Chaos  is active:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+    Greatly raises total BRV potency  2-HIT melee BRV attack
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed
Passives.Soul of Chaos Extend: When using  Soul of Chaos :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 6- Moderately raises BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRVWhen using  Soul of Chaos+ :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 6- Moderately raises BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV- Grants  Soul of Discord  for 1 turn if target is broken by the abilityWhile  Soul of Chaos  buff is active:- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+    1-HIT melee BRV + HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Defense: Raises Max BRV and Defense by 20%
Passives.Set Soul of Discord BRV Up Extend: When using  Set Soul of Discord BRV Up , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns

Weapons.Rebellion CP: 15: When using  Round Edge  and  Round Edge+ :- Raises BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Extends the duration of  Soul of Chaos  buff- Grants an additional stack of  Soul of Chaos
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Set Soul of Discord BRV Up  use +1Duration of  Set Soul of Discord BRV Up  effects +1 turn
Weapons.Chaosbringer CP: 35: When using  Soul of Chaos  and  Soul of Chaos+ :- Raises BRV potency- Extends the duration of  Soul of Chaos  buff- Grants an additional stack of  Soul of Chaos
Weapons.Balmung CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Disaster of Chaos
